trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSB614_01310_SEQ_00<tab>Torn between curiosity and scorn, Maucolyn would report an odd sighting.

TEXT_GAIUSB614_01310_SEQ_01<tab>Maucolyn has recently observed a local trader capering in the cold, tossing snowballs in what the dour chocobokeep assumes to be a fit of hypothermic hysteria. Speak with this trader, Duvicauroix, and inquire as to his well-being.

TEXT_GAIUSB614_01310_SEQ_02<tab>Happily, there proves to be a method to Duvicauroix's madness. The trader asserts that playing in the snow can warm the body and heart on a cold winter's day more so than even a fire, and teaches you how to /throw a snowball as the first step toward mastering this invigorating form of play...
TEXT_GAIUSB614_01310_MAUCOLYN_000_000<tab>I can't see as how I oughta care, but I saw a fella out throwin' snowballs at a snowman. Why anyone'd engage in such japery in the cold, I can't rightly say.

TEXT_GAIUSB614_01310_MAUCOLYN_000_001<tab>Went nut gatherin' and lost more'n he found, is my guess. Ye better make sure that don't happen to <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Not that I know precisely <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> happened, mind ye.

TEXT_GAIUSB614_01310_MAUCOLYN_000_002<tab>What's that? Me? <var 1A 02 /var>Ask<var 1A 01 /var>? I got my chocobos to see to. If Duvicauroix wants to upend his head soup on the snow, I can't see what business o' mine it'd be.

TEXT_GAIUSB614_01310_MAUCOLYN_000_003<tab>Yep, that's his name─Duvicauroix. I don't know, he sells things, goes places. Don't seem like no kind o' life to me, beggin' pardon. Ye want to see him, I reckon he's somewhere about.

TEXT_GAIUSB614_01310_DUVICAUROIX_000_010<tab>Walking softly, eh, adventurer? Those around here think I'm winter<var 1F /var>drunk, I'll wager. Hah! Never seen a snow<var 1F /var>toss before, the lazy by<var 1F /var>blows.

TEXT_GAIUSB614_01310_DUVICAUROIX_000_011<tab>Sit on your arse in front of a poor fire too long, and soon you got the swivin' white<var 1F /var>knuckles. You'll sleep the better for tossing snowballs, without needing Lady Mead or Mistress Ale to sing the lullaby.

TEXT_GAIUSB614_01310_DUVICAUROIX_000_012<tab>What do you say, eh? Why not give it a try? It's as simple as you'd imagine. Just reach on down, grab some of the powdery white, and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>throw<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_GAIUSB614_01310_SYSTEM_000_300<tab>You have learned the emote <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Throw<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
